summary.content: Shiver me timbers, arrr! I’ve noticed a few sites promoting “Talk Like A Pirate Day”. Jeremy Keith even put together a “Talk Like A Pirate” translator. Oh boy!

content.html: Shiver me timbers, arrr! I’ve noticed a few sites promoting “Talk Like A Pirate Day”. Jeremy Keith even put together a “Talk Like A Pirate” translator. Oh boy!
content.plain: Shiver me timbers, arrr! I’ve noticed a few sites promoting “Talk Like A Pirate Day”. Jeremy Keith even put together a “Talk Like A Pirate” translator. Oh boy!
content.source: Shiver me timbers, arrr! I’ve noticed a few sites promoting [“Talk Like A Pirate Day”]({{% wayback "http://www.talklikeapirate.com" %}}). [Jeremy Keith]({{% wayback "http://www.adactio.com/journal/" %}}) even put together a [“Talk Like A Pirate” translator]({{% wayback "http://www.adactio.com/extras/talklikeapirate/" %}}). Oh boy!
